title: Kansas City, MO man shot in back by passenger
content:
TOPEKA (WIBW)-- A 21-year-old Kansas City, Missouri man underwent surgery at a Topeka hospital Tuesday, he was accidentally shot in the back by a passenger in his car.
The Kansas Highway Patrol told 13 NEWS Randall Hardy was driving Monday night near the east Topeka toll gate when a person in the back seat accidentally fired a 9 MM handgun.
KHP says he underwent surgery Tuesday. The hospital could not release an update on his condition.
Authorities say the shooting is still under investigation, but believe it was accidental.
